messages.message: [Webservice consolidation] Hi all, I am working on consolidating webservices (api-server, api-server-apps, apps-server, webapp etc). As part of this, I will be merging some large but mechanical changes over the next few days/weeks. One such sample PR is here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/29650). Please feel free to DM me if you are working on these parts of our codebase and are adversely affected.

Hey Sabya, would you be able to hold off this for maybe another week. My team has been working on the thrift client migration to grpc, and have some massive PR’s coming for the four web services (5000 lines + of code). The PR’s are all being staged on a branch right now for some extensive testing but will be all merging in this week.
Yes, we should be able to finish the work in two or three days. Thanks

@Heymian: yes, I can surely wait a bit longer. @Yan Wang, would you be a good POC to talk to in this regard? Basically to coordinate the merging and the timeline etc. Also, can you share references to the PR. I can check and see how disruptive they may be.

Sure. We are currently holding our changes in one branch and will create a PR to merge it with master. I will share you the PR once it's created. I will also update you once the merge is done.  Thank you!
@Sabyasachi Roy we can work around your changes. Is there a documented timeline? I want to align Solution Builder work with yours.
Hey @Sabyasachi Roy This is our pr (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/30461#issuecomment-1244609541) and we are system testing it. After that we will merge.
